price: Er sagte: „Ihr und eure Väter befindet euch ja in einem deutlichen Irrtum.
arabic: قَالَ لَقَدۡ كُنتُمۡ أَنتُمۡ وَءَابَآؤُكُمۡ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: qāla laqad kuntum antum waābāukum fī ḍalālin mubīnin
